thread.title: The Best Reactions To Moonlight's Best Picture Win - How Meryl Streep, Matt Damon and More Reacted to Best Picture at the OScars
thread.title_full: The Best Reactions To Moonlight's Best Picture Win - How Meryl Streep, Matt Damon and More Reacted to Best Picture at the OScars

author: Erica Gonzales
title: The Best Reactions To Moonlight's Best Picture Win - How Meryl Streep, Matt Damon and More Reacted to Best Picture at the OScars
text:
Moonlight 's stunning Best Picture win —after La La Land accidentally claimed it first—at last night's Academy Awards will be a moment remembered in Oscars history. The mix-up elicited responses in applause, shouts, gasps, tweets and even memes, but the best reactions didn't require any words at all. Below, see the biggest Oscar-goers of the night, caught in the very moment when they realized what had just happened on stage.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Shirley MacLaine
Y'all, we almost lost Shirley MacLaine on Oscar Night! #Moonlight #BestPicture #Oscars pic.twitter.com/WezOUT3DZp
— Giancarlo Es Posible (@BrandenAlarm) February 27, 2017
